amendment.description: To strike provisions relating to increased research.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1495 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1495 proposed by Senator Udall CO for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S222; text: CR S222) To strike provisions relating to increased research.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1495 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
